definition: to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)
to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: Known from a single stream in an isolated cloud forest.
sentences.chinese: 這種蛙類曾生活在一個與世隔絕的霧林的溪流內。

sentences.english: In the country near D---- a man lived quite alone.
sentences.chinese: 在迪涅附近的一個鄉村裏住着一個與世隔絕的人。

sentences.english: The playwright cocooned himself in a world of pretence.
sentences.chinese: 這個劇作家與世隔絕，生活在一個虛幻的世界裏。

sentences.english: You cannot grow to Christlikeness in isolation.
sentences.chinese: 與世隔絕，你是不會成長，活出基督的。

sentences.english: The isolation and cut-off feeling can be dire.
sentences.chinese: 與世隔絕和孤立感是非常可怕的。

sentences.english: In Milan in the 1600s, three-quarters of the female nobility were cloistered.
sentences.chinese: 在17世紀的米蘭，四分之三的女性貴族都與世隔絕。

sentences.english: I could be learning, you could be yearning to see behind closed doors.
sentences.chinese: 我可以學，你可以期待關上門與世隔絕。

sentences.english: Tendai comes to live in an isolated African village.
sentences.chinese: 天岱來到一個與世隔絕的非洲村落居住。

sentences.english: Born in 1869 in a backwater Indian town, he came of age on a continent pathetically subject to the West, intellectually as well as materially.
sentences.chinese: 他於1869年出生於一個與世隔絕的印度小鎮。

sentences.english: Off-world colonies advertise a greater life via flying billboards.
sentences.chinese: 與世隔絕的殖民地通過飛行板宣傳着自己生活的美好。
凡裏是一個與世隔絕的國家。

sentences.english: But how long can his isolation last?
sentences.chinese: 不過，他的與世隔絕能夠持續多久？

sentences.english: She was cocooned in a private world of privilege.
sentences.chinese: 她生活在一個與世隔絕的特權世界裏。

sentences.english: No phone or utility lines coming in. Self-contained.
sentences.chinese: 沒有電話或者市政管線進入，自給自足，與世隔絕。

sentences.english: Only vaguely a few tourist. Quiet, isolated, with no ideas and personal considerations.
sentences.chinese: 只有依稀幾個進山的人，安靜，與世隔絕，心無雜念。

sentences.english: A secluded Greek island with my lover.
sentences.chinese: 和愛人去一個與世隔絕的希臘小島。

definition: variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
not knowing anything at all (idiom); completely ignorant/without an inkling
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
in (some place)/to be in (adversity, a difficult situation, danger, turmoil etc)/to find oneself in/placed in/surrounded by
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
